info.location: The Netherlands, Amsterdam, Cairo, Egypt, Veliko Tarnovo, Bulgaria, Istanbul, Turkey, Reykjavik, Iceland and Thessaloniki, Greece

about.me: We are Jochum & Martijn, running a Single pool. Mission based by donating 20% of operator rewards to local charity and supporting the Cardano network by having VPS relays in poor network covered countries.
about.server: Combination of Intel NUC, Gigabyte BRIX, (AMD) Raspberry Pi's and cloud based relays, distributed in poor network covered countries. Reliable setup, contingency covered, multiple layers of security, excellent monitoring.
